alert.note: Alert for Koochiching; North St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 5:53PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN KOOCHICHING AND NORTHWESTERN ST. LOUIS COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM CDT... At 553 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rainy Lake West, or 13 miles northeast of International Falls, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rainy Lake East around 610 PM CDT. Kabetogama Lake around 620 PM CDT. Voyageurs National Park around 625 PM CDT. Kettle Falls around 630 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Island View. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. This storm may intensify. Monitor local NOAA Weather Radio, commercial radio, or television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
